SEARCH
Module com.example.protrack
Package com.example.protrack.supplier

Interface SupplierDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SupplierDAOImplementation
public interface SupplierDAO
Interface for Supplier Data Access Object (DAO) that defines methods for interacting with the suppliers data in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addSupplier(Supplier supplier)
    Adds a new supplier to the database.
    void
    createTable()
    Creates the suppliers table in the database if it does not already exist.
    void
    deleteSupplier(int supplierId)
    Deletes a supplier from the database by its ID.
    List<Supplier>
    getAllSuppliers()
    Retrieves all suppliers from the database.
    Supplier
    getSupplier(int supplierId)
    Retrieves a supplier from the database by its ID.
    void
    updateSupplier(Supplier supplier)
    Updates an existing supplier in the database.

  • Method Details

    • createTable

      void createTable()
      Creates the suppliers table in the database if it does not already exist.

    • addSupplier

      void addSupplier(Supplier supplier)
      Adds a new supplier to the database.
      Parameters:
      supplier - the Supplier object to be added

    • getSupplier

      Supplier getSupplier(int supplierId)
      Retrieves a supplier from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      supplierId - the ID of the supplier to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Supplier object corresponding to the specified ID

    • getAllSuppliers

      List<Supplier> getAllSuppliers()
      Retrieves all suppliers from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all Supplier objects

    • updateSupplier

      void updateSupplier(Supplier supplier)
      Updates an existing supplier in the database.
      Parameters:
      supplier - the Supplier object with updated information

    • deleteSupplier

      void deleteSupplier(int supplierId)
      Deletes a supplier from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      supplierId - the ID of the supplier to delete
